      Formatter.OrderTableFormatter liner(String... spec)
      Description copied from interface: Formatter.TableFormatter
      Include a horizontal line with a pattern of limiters and fillers.
      Specified by:
      liner in interface Formatter.TableFormatter
      Parameters:
      spec - vararg to define vertical limiters: ('|', '+', '<space>') and horizontal fillers: ('-', '<space>') to render horizontal lines in a table. Example: "+-|-|-+".

      chainable self reference
